com.xorprogramming.wallpaper

Interface WallpaperScene


  • public interface WallpaperScene
    An interface that defines the fundamental operations required for a live wallpaper
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Used for disposing of resources such as graphics
      void initialize(Context c)
      Used for loading and initializing the graphics of the scene
      void onSizeChange(Context c, int newWidth, int newHeight)
      Called when the size of the live wallpaper changes.
      void render(Canvas c, int width, int height)
      Called when the scene needs to be rendered
      void update(float deltaT, int width, int height)
      Called when the state of the scene needs to be updated

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(float deltaT,
          int width,
          int height)
        Called when the state of the scene needs to be updated
        Parameters:
        deltaT - The time interval since the method was last called
        width - The width of the live wallpaper
        height - The height of the live wallpaper

      • initialize

        void initialize(Context c)
        Used for loading and initializing the graphics of the scene
        Parameters:
        c - The context used for graphics initialization

      • onSizeChange

        void onSizeChange(Context c,
                int newWidth,
                int newHeight)
        Called when the size of the live wallpaper changes. Note that method should be called once after initialization but before rendering
        Parameters:
        c - The context used for graphics initialization
        newWidth - The new width of the live wallpaper
        newHeight - The new height of the live wallpaper

      • render

        void render(Canvas c,
          int width,
          int height)
        Called when the scene needs to be rendered
        Parameters:
        c - The Canvas on which the rendering occurs
        width - The width of the live wallpaper
        height - The height of the live wallpaper

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Used for disposing of resources such as graphics
